channel.title: [HELP] Cursor?
channel.description:
Ok, I want to make a Cursor... A Crosshair cursor. Im using RWCursorEditor (Real World Cursor Editor). My problem is... hard to explain. The top of the Windows cursors, there is a point. that point is the minimum place if you go ne further, you wont be able to click a button for example. Now for a crosshair, i need that the MIDDLE of the crosshair is exactly at the same place as the point, without the Crosshair getting 1/4th.
Its really coomplicated, i know. But for the peopel that understand, help me? :)

item.title: [HELP] Cursor?
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:2, topic:176231”]I’m sure theres some feature that allows you to change the location that windows registers the click.

Look it up in the manual. Somewhere in the ‘help’ menu I assume.[/quote]

Thanks, I found it

Read full topic
